title: Minecraft 基岩版 1.2 build 7 发布
author: cc7w
txt_content:
本帖最后由 广药 于 2020-6-13 17:59 编辑 
测试版是Minecraft 基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。 然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。 适用于正式版的领域服务器不兼容，不提供支持。 Minecraft 基岩版 1.2 正式版 仍未发布， build 7 为其第 7 个测试版 转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。  Tweaks:
调整：
Jungle leaves are now transparent on higher-end devices when Fancy Leaves are enabled当 更好的树叶 选项启用时 丛林树叶 在一些高端的设备上变透明了Changed the sound effects for Creeper explosions调整爬行者爆炸的音效

Fixes from Bugs in Beta:
修复Beta版本的bug：
The selected item recipe will no longer change when ingredients run out to avoid unintentional item crafting选中的物品配方在原材料耗尽时不会改变了，这是为了预防不小心合成其他物品Several improvements to finding items in the Recipe Book while in Creative mode一些针对创造模式下在配方书中寻找物品的改进Made improvements to manual crafting when using a touch screen使用触屏手动合成时的一些修改The proper amount of wool that is craftable in the Recipe Book will now be shown配方书中显示的可合成羊毛的数量正确了Crafting and selecting items when using a controller will now be occur on button press, not release使用手柄时，会在按下按钮而不是释放按钮时合成或选择物品了Creative mode now has a 2x2 crafting grid in the inventory创造模式的背包界面拥有2x2的合成网格了When an item is selected, tapping anywhere that the item cannot be placed will now deselect it当物品被选择时，点击其他物品不能被放置的地方会取消选择物品Search results in the Recipe Book will now show all relevant items, not just craftable items配方书的搜索结果会展示所有有关联的物品，而不是仅可合成的物品Controller bumper buttons can now be used when navigating the How to Play menu手柄的Bumper按钮在游玩说明菜单可以使用了Fixed corrupted icons in How to Play menu when using various languages修复在使用某些语言时游玩说明菜单的一些图标错误的问题Fixed a crash that could occur when switching Resource Packs修复切换资源包时可能崩溃的问题The recipe for Empty Locator Maps will now recognize Empty Maps as an ingredient空的定位地图的配方现在不会将空地图作为原材料了The recipe for Empty Locator Maps will now appear for the 2x2 crafting grid空的定位地图的配方在2x2的合成网格也会出现了Fixed overlapping text on the 3D Export screen修复3D导出页面覆盖文字的问题Mob attack damage will now be adjusted based on difficulty怪物的攻击伤害现在会根据游戏难度调整了Glowstone will now prevent monsters from spawning from a monster spawner萤石会阻止怪物从刷怪箱中生成了Trees grown with bone meal will no longer fill the trunk with leaves使用骨粉催熟的树不会让树干变成树叶了Fixed the hit box for stairs修复楼梯的碰撞箱Fixed corrupted End portal textures修复错误的末地传送门贴图Blocks affected by gravity will no longer push mobs or players into the ground被重力影响的方块不会将怪物或玩家推到地上了Fixed the paper doll on the pause menu being scaled incorrectly修复暂停界面的纸玩偶的缩放比例不正确的问题Iron pickaxes will now mine at the proper speed铁镐挖矿的速度现在正常了The Cancel button no longer overlaps the progress bar when downloading from the store在从商店下载东西时取消按钮不会覆盖在进度条上了Replaced the icon for the left analog stick to better distinguish from the right analog stick替换左摇杆的图标，使其与右摇杆更方便区分

Fixes from Bugs in Retail:
修复零售版的bug：
Boats will now move faster on ice船现在会在冰上移动的更快了Original Music Pack will now be imported properly after downloading and no longer cause the game to crash原始音乐包在下载后可以正确导入，不会使游戏崩溃了Guardian and Elder Guardian laser attacks can now penetrate armor to damage players守卫者和远古守卫者发出的激光可以无视护甲伤害玩家了The sneak button on controllers can now be used to get out of boats, plus added a tooltip on-screen for how to dismount手柄的Sneak按钮现在可以用来下船，并且在屏幕上增加了怎么取消骑乘的提示Squid will now spawn properly in oceans鱿鱼在海中会正确生成了Creepers start hissing a bit earlier now苦力怕开始发出嘶嘶声的时间会更早了Slightly decreased Creeper explosion damage些微减少苦力怕的爆炸伤害Nether portal blocks are now breakable in Creative mode when the default game mode was Survival当默认生存模式是生存时，在创造模式下地狱传送门的方块可以被破坏了
      正版地址谷歌正版https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mojang.minecraftpe测试组https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.mojang.minecraftpePE官方博客https://feedback.minecraft.net/   外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪 Mojang官方博客（英文）MCPE 测试版官方博客 （英文，内地需**）Jeb的Twitter（英文，内地需**）tomcc的Twitter（英文，内地需**）MissMarzenia的Twitter（英文，内地需**）Jason的Twitter（英文，内地需**）Daniel的Twitter（英文，内地需**）Shoghi的Twitter（英文，内地需**）
